Con los datos `prostate.data`:

1. Cargar fichero en R

```{r}
data <- read.csv('../../data/prostate.data', header = TRUE, row.names = 1)
```

2. Separar en train/test de acuerdo con los valores de la columna `train`

```{r}
train <- data[ data$train, colnames(data) != "train"]
test  <- data[!data$train, colnames(data) != "train"]
```

3. Ajustar modelos de regresión sobre `lpsa`:
    
  * Best subset
  * Fordward stepwise
  * Lasso
  * Ridge regression
  * Elastic Net
  * PCR
  * PLS
  
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaps)

bs <- regsubsets(lpsa ~ ., data = train)
summary(bs)
```

```{r}
fs <- step(lm(lpsa ~ ., data = train))
```


```{r}
library(glmnet)
library(glmnetUtils)
```

```{r}
library(pls)
```
